All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ActuatorConfig
A configuration class that activates the httpExchanges actuator.
Buddy
 
BuddyAddDto
A model class which creates the DTO (Data Transfer Object) BuddyAddDto.
BuddyBuilder
A class that contains two methods for creating a relationship between two users (buddy) and the associated composite key.
BuddyController
A class that receives requests made from some of the usual CRUD endpoints and specific URL for the Buddies.
BuddyKey
The serializable composite Key BuddyKey of Buddy class.
BuddyRepository
Repository interface which extends the JPA (Jakarta Persistence API) Repository in order to deal with JPQL query relative to Buddy entities.
BuddyService
A service class which performs the business processes relating to the POJO Buddy before calling the repository.
EWalletApplication
The main class of the application.
EwalletTransactionAddDto
A model class which creates the DTO (Data Transfer Object) EwalletTransactionAddDto.
HandlerInterceptorImpl
A class that implements WebMvcConfigurer, a native Spring MVC class.
IBuddyService
BuddyService interface that abstracts it from its implementation in order to achieve better code modularity in compliance with SOLID principles.
ITransactionService
TransactionService interface that abstracts it from its implementation in order to achieve better code modularity in compliance with SOLID principles.
IUserService
UserService interface that abstracts it from its implementation in order to achieve better code modularity in compliance with SOLID principles.
MySqlQueries
A class of constants that groups together a list of JPQL (Java Persistence Query Language) queries.
PasswordManager
A class that contains a set of methods for hashing, salting, encrypting and decrypting passwords.
Transaction
A model class which creates the POJO (Plain Old Java Object) Transaction.
TransactionAddDto
A model class which creates the DTO (Data Transfer Object) TransactionAddDto.
TransactionController
A class that receives requests made from some of the usual CRUD endpoints and specific URL for the Transactions.
TransactionRepository
Repository interface which extends the JPA (Jakarta Persistence API) Repository in order to deal with Derived and JPQL query relative to Transaction entities.
TransactionService
A service class which performs the business processes relating to the POJO Transaction before calling the repository
TransactionUtil
A class that contains two methods for filtering and ordering Transaction model entities.
TransactionView
A class that contains some interfaces that inherit from each other.These are used to filter the attributes to be returned in response to requests sent to the API.
TransactionView.AmountView
 
TransactionView.DateView
 
TransactionView.DescriptionView
 
TransactionView.FeeView

TransactionView.SenderView
 
TransactionView.TransactionSimpleView
 
UriToIgnore
A class of constants that regroups a short list of URI that the logger should ignore.
User
A model class which creates the POJO (Plain Old Java Object) User.
UserController
A class that receives requests made from some of the usual CRUD endpoints and specific URL for the Users.
UserLoginDto
A model class which creates the DTO (Data Transfer Object) UserLoginDto.
UserProfileDto
A model class which creates the DTO (Data Transfer Object) UserProfileDto.
UserRepository
Repository interface which extends the JPA (Jakarta Persistence API) Repository in order to deal with Derived and JPQL query relative to User entities.
UserService
A service class which performs the business processes relating to the POJO User before calling the repository.
UserTransactionDto
A model class which creates the DTO (Data Transfer Object) UserTransactionDto.
UserView
A class that contains some interfaces that inherit from each other.These are used to filter the attributes to be returned in response to requests sent to the API.
